类 Predator

java.lang.Object
  




public class Predator
extends SimpleActor

A predator chases the nearest food object, and eats it if it can catch it.

版本:
2020.07.28
作者:
Supeng He (supeng)

Predator()
          Creates a new Predator object.
 
方法概要
 void act()
          Take one step closer toward the nearest food object, eating it if we land on it.
